name: Colony Contruction
description:
A small game about gathering resources and building up a colony on the moon. 
Controls:
Walking: W, A, S, D
Jump: Space
Interact: E
Radio: Q
Pause: ESC

How to play: 
You log onto the terminal by interacting with it. There you see 3 categories: Power, Habitat, and Infrastructure. Their price is shown with small icons, and you can see your inventory at the top of the screen. You slowly unlock more buildings and build out your colony. 

PS. 
This game is not balanced so it might be a bit hard or easy. 
And sorry for the size...
